categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname
Category:Imperial Navy pilots of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Cloak Leader was a TIE/LN starfighter pilot in Grand Admiral Thrawn's fleet circa 9 ABY.

This man led the force of TIEs and mole miners which were hidden in the cloaked cargo hold of the Nartissteu at the start of the Battle of Sluis Van. When the A-class bulk freighter exploded, Cloak Leader reported to Captain Pellaeon that the command section of the freighter had escaped and then engaged in protecting the mole miners as they attached themselves to "rebel" vessels, until he was ordered by Thrawn to retreat back to the Chimaera.
